title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1366/85 of 24 May 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2268/84 and (EEC) No 2278/84 as regards the selling price of intervention butter for export
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1366/85
of 24 May 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2268/84 and (EEC) No 2278/84 as regards the selling price of intervention butter for export
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. '34,50 ECU' in Article 2 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2268/84 is hereby replaced by '28 ECU'.
2. '40 ECU' in Article 2 (1) (b) of Regulation (EEC) No 2278/84 is hereby replaced by '33,50 ECU'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 27 May 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 May 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 137, 27. 5. 1985, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 208, 3. 8. 1984, p. 35.
(4) OJ No L 108, 20. 4. 1985, p. 7.
(5) OJ No L 209, 4. 8. 1984, p. 8.
(6) OJ No L 326, 13. 12. 1984, p. 13.
